name: Get MS Office information
description:
Returns several Microsoft Office-related information, such as the version of the suite, the applications installed, the language preferences, the size of the user's Outlook Data Files and the used space in the OneDrive business account folder.
Useful for troubleshooting both Office-related and disk space issues and for managing the Office migration to the cloud. The script is developed for Windows 10 and 7 and Microsoft Office 2010 onwards.

outputs.description: Version of the Microsoft Office suite installed on the device
outputs.name: MSOfficeVersion

outputs.description: List of display languages installed on the device
outputs.name: InstalledDisplayLanguages

outputs.description: List of editing languages installed on the device
outputs.name: InstalledEditingLanguages

outputs.description: Number of .PST files stored on the device
outputs.name: NumberOfPSTfiles

outputs.description: Number of .OST files stored on the device
outputs.name: NumberOfOSTfiles

outputs.description: Size of the .PST file, or sum of all .PST files' sizes
outputs.name: PSTOverallSize

outputs.description: Size of the .OST file, or sum of all .OST files' sizes
outputs.name: OSTOverallSize

outputs.description: Size on the disk of the OneDrive folder
outputs.name: OneDriveSyncFilesSize

outputs.description: Size on the disk of all other data locally synchronized through OneDrive agent
outputs.name: OtherOneDriveSyncFilesSize
